title: Verify that we are able to delete the network location policy
custom_steps:
1.Delete network location based policy
2. Delete the Network location profile using REST APIs 
3. If network profile is used in policy, we should get error message.
custom_expected:
1. We should able to delete network profiles without any issues
2. Network profile can be deleted if it is not invoked in any of the places
       - SSL DND Policy
       - RTP policy
       - Steering exception
       - any other place
